segments.text: Elegance Hotel , is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I would like to make a reservation for four nights next week , from Tuesday to Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , single or double room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Single room with a bath room , please . I would like a room with a view of the whole city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . We have a single room available right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 578 yuan a night , plus VAT , including air-conditioner and TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does that include breakfast ? Can I make calls on outside line ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it includes English breakfast . For the phone , I am afraid you can not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , that's fine . Could you hold it for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to confirm the reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1
